description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6t616","text":"A rapid microplate-compatible protocol for cleanup of PCR products prior to Sanger sequencing. Verify that the PCR produces a single band, and retain some PCR product for cleanup and sequencing. Set up at room temperature, and react on the thermocycler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4bfke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftnq9","text":"Mechanism: PCR products contain 1) primers and 2) dNTPs which will interfere with downstream Sanger sequencing reactions. Exonuclease I degrades ssDNA (primers) and calf intestinal phosphatase degrades dNTPs. Functions like NEB #E1050.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":224,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"4bgla","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B219856E24D111EEA14A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/e1050-exo-cip-rapid-pcr-cleanup-kit#Product%20Information"}}}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"v6b8","text":"Quick CIP (5U/uL) NEB #M0525","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"95nd6","text":"Thermolabile Exonuclease I (20U/uL) NEB #M0568","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"b4q96","text":"rCutSmart buffer NEB #B6004 (or CutSmart buffer)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":17,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"cv2pe","text":"NEBuffer r3.1 NEB #B6003 (or NEBuffer 3.1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":14,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"8raom","text":"PCR-grade water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"ED92FA1024D011EEA14A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/m0525-quick-cip#Product%20Information"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F2C2D7AA24D011EEA14A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/m0568-thermolabile-exonuclease-i#Product%20Information"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2B99843024D111EE8A72BF6CABE0AC6E","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/b6004-rcutsmart-buffer#Product%20Information"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"508E6C6024D111EE8A72BF6CABE0AC6E","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/b6003-nebuffer-r3-1#Product%20Information"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3dt1b","text":"Add to a 1.5 mL sterile conical tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvlqe","text":"760 uL water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j9hs","text":"94 uL 10x rCutSmart buffer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25gqb","text":"96 uL 10x Exonuclease I buffer (NEBuffer r3.1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o61n","text":"4 uL Quick CIP (5U/uL) NEB #M0525","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"ano46","text":"10 uL Thermolabile Exonuclease I (20U/uL) NEB #M0568","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":10}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2B0010E624D211EEA14A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/m0525-quick-cip#Product%20Information"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2B00113224D211EEA14A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/m0568-thermolabile-exonuclease-i#Product%20Information"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkal1","text":"Mix, then aliquot 200 uL into separate tubes. Store at -20C. Good for at least 2 years.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crmcq","text":" Seal tubes or plates and place on a thermocycler. React at 37ºC for 15 minutes, then 80ºC for 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cc9ge","text":"Mix 1.2 uL of master mix with 1.5 uL PCR product in PCR strip tubes or plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9asna","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"849nm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"19t22","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4n1t6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"71et8","text":"A 1:1 ratio of enzyme mix:PCR product can also be used. Pipetting 2 uL may be easier, and you can do equal parts in such a case. If doing a large number of reactions, I generally use 2 uL because it is faster to pipette that volume and ensure it stays in the tube.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"embed","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"align":null,"can_edit":true,"code":"\u003ciframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/n1-Nze7vYJI\" title=\"YouTube video player\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" allowfullscreen=\"\"\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e","guid":"85741F0424D311EEA14A0A58A9FEAC02"}},"2":{"type":"embed","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"code":"\u003ciframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/n1-Nze7vYJI\" title=\"YouTube video player\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e","guid":"87CD1D5024D311EE8A72BF6CABE0AC6E"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dreii","text":"Add the product to Sanger sequencing reactions. 1 uL of product, 1 uL of 10 uM primer, and 10 uL of water per tube. If the band is faint, you can use 2 uL or more of product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c99is","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5alnn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a6f3j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ptle","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"87u3","text":"Follow the sequencing facility's requirements for template DNA and primer concentration. The above amounts are recommendations based on what has worked for us.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

title: 20 minute PCR Enzymatic Cleanup
